title: FT/FS: 1909-12 PX7 Sweet Caporal Domino Discs HOF Lot
author: gunboat82

posts.post_title: FT/FS: 1909-12 PX7 Sweet Caporal Domino Discs HOF Lot
posts.post_content:
1909-12 PX7 Sweet Caporal Domino Discs Lot of 13 (all HOFers)

Cy Young PSA 2 GD
Chief Bender PSA 5 EX
Christy Mathewson PSA 2 GD
Nap Lajoie PSA 2 GD
Tris Speaker PSA 2 (MK)
Frank "Home Run" Baker PSA 3 VG
Clark Griffith PSA 4 VG-EX
Eddie Collins PSA 1 PR
Ed Walsh PSA 6 EX-MT
Rube Marquard PSA 4 VG-EX
John McGraw PSA 2 GD
Mordecai "Three Finger" Brown PSA 2 GD
Roger Bresnahan PSA 2 GD

$3500 delivered.

I'd prefer to move these as a lot, which is how I acquired them. I might be willing to piece them out, but I have no earthly clue what they're worth individually.

I'm also open to trades. I'm primarily looking for:

Cracker Jack (esp. Speaker and Lajoie)
Colgan's Chips
T205 (esp. Speaker, Young, Mathewson, Johnson, Cobb)
Bond Bread Jackie Robinson
P2 Johnson and Cobb
PX7 Raw Domino Disc Cobb
T206 Lajoie with bat
Sherlock Bread Ruth or Johnson pins
1933 George Miller Mel Ott
E106 Speaker

Thanks for looking!

More photos available.
Price dropped to $3K delivered Venmo/PayPal F&F ($3110 G&S).

It's silly season! Final price drop to $2800 delivered, which is less than these went for this summer on REA, before I paid PSA an arm and a leg to entomb them.

If you think the discs look better naked, I'll liberate them for you, free of charge. My ROI on this transaction would be -31%, but I suspect you'll do better than that.
